Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Lake Shore
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheridan, Diversey, Cannon to Nature Museum due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Sheridan, Diversey, Cannon and Nature Museum, due to street blockage near Belmont/Lake Shore.

Allow extra travel time.
